Planned activities:

The following describes the preliminarily planned schedule. Note that it may vary to adapt to the number and nature of the received contributions.

  • [09:00 - 09:45] WELCOME by workshop chairs & KEYNOTE 1
  • [09:45 - 10:45] SESSION 1 (approx. 4 papers)
  • [10:45 - 11:15] BREAK
  • [11:15 - 12:30] SESSION 2 (approx. 5 papers)
  • [12:30 - 13:30] BREAK
  • [13:30 - 14:15] KEYNOTE 2
  • [14:15 - 15:15] SESSION 3 (approx. 4 papers)
  • [15:15 - 15:30] BREAK
  • [15:30 - 16:45] DISCUSSION BOARD
  • [17:00] CLOSING

Expected number of participants:

10-15 research papers 25+ attendants (this may depend on the evolution of the Covid-19 situation)
